import { Component, Input, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { FaceSnape } from "../models/face-snap-models"; @Component({ selector: "app-face-snap", templateUrl: "./face-snap.component.html", styleUrls: ["./face-snap.component.scss"], }) export class FaceSnapComponent implements OnInit { @Input() faceSnap!: FaceSnape; buttonText!: string; ngOnInit() { this.buttonText != "click me"; } onSnap() { if (this.buttonText === "Oh Snap!") { this.faceSnap.snaps++; this.buttonText = "Oops, unSnap!"; } else { this.faceSnap.snaps--; this.buttonText = "Oh Snap!"; } } }
